name: Party Hunt - Team Sass Effect
description:
Party Hunt by Team Sass Effect

Party Hunt is a party game similar to hide and seek - with a deceitful twist! 

In parties of 2 to 10, players will take on the roles of Hunter and Hider. After Hiders hide themselves and their decoy (an exact copy of their chosen object), Hunters are tasked with finding the Hiders without being caught out by their decoys.

Will you be able to trick your friends and reign victorious?

Information

Party Hunt is intended for mobile enjoyment, but can be played on desktop as well.  Feel free to download the apk or exe. 

Developer

William Basson

Marnus Labuschagne

Andrew Nel

Art

Alister Heyns

Jennay Kloosterman

Alyssa Coetzee

Sound
